title: Risks.Assess.Input
description: Input messageType for the Risks.Assess capability.

org_ref.description: Opaque identifier for the organization being assessed.

standard_refs.description: Rich references to the exact standards, profiles, or contextualized variants used for this assessment.

uid.description: Unique identifier for this specific standard instance (e.g., UUID, URN, vendor-provided ID).

name.description: Human-readable name of the standard (e.g., PCI-DSS, NIST-AI-RMF).

version.description: Version or revision of the standard (e.g., 3.2.1, 2023-09).

profile.description: Optional profile, flavor, or implementation variant (e.g., 'PCI-DSS SAQ-D', 'NIST-AI-RMF Retail Profile').

source.description: Where the standard came from (e.g., Vendor-Manager, Compliance-Validator, Data-Steward, external registry).

contextual_conditions.description: Optional contextual conditions or scoping rules applied to this standard.

payload.description: Unstructured representation of the standard. May be a PDF, JSON, XML, text, or any other format.

applied_at.description: Timestamp when this standard was applied in an assessment or audit.

original_publication_date.description: When the standard was originally published, if known.

evidence.description: Optional evidence bundles from other agents.

assessment_mode.description: Controls the depth and scope of the assessment.

bulk_scope.description: Optional list of org_refs for bulk assessments.

caller_context.description: Information about the invoking agent for policy enforcement.
